m_szDocTitle: Mercedes-Benz GLC Confirmed with Hydrogen Fuel Cell for 2017
m_szDocSumamry: Mercedes-Benz GLC Confirmed with Hydrogen Fuel Cell for 2017 ‚åñ A- A+ Mercedes-Benz is set to launch a hydrogen fuel cell version of its GLC crossover sometime in 2017. The eco-friendly GLC-Class is expected to have a range of around 300 miles (approx. 500 km) and will be fitted with the latest in fuel cell technology available on the market. The news comes straight from Thomas Weber, the head of Mercedes-Benz's Research&Development department.
